data.comment: Charleroi kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Marco Ilaimaharitra (Charleroi) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 20, Philippe Clement is making the team's first substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Federico Ricca replacing Simon Deli.
Maxime Busi (Charleroi) gets a yellow card.
Eduard Sobol for Brugge has been booked by Lawrence Visser and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Jan Breydel Stadium.
Lawrence Visser blows to start the second-half. Brugge with the kick-off.
Emmanuel Dennis (Brugge) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 64, At Jan Breydel Stadium, Steeven Willems has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ryota Morioka scores to make it 0-1 at Jan Breydel Stadium.
Philippe Clement (Brugge) is making a second substitution, with Charles De Ketelaere replacing Eduard Sobol.
In the minute 83, The away team replace Marco Ilaimaharitra with Lucas Ribeiro.
The home team have replaced Emmanuel Dennis with Siebe Schrijvers. This is the third substitution made today by Philippe Clement.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
